Question
========

Of 8 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 8 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 34 and the standard deviation is 39. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 2.33
* 2.47
* 3.11
* 3.51

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.33: Incorrect
* 2.47: Correct
* 3.11: Incorrect
* 3.51: Incorrect
